title: CrushFTP security advisory (AV25-165)
description: On March 21, 2025,CrushFTP published a security advisory to address a vulnerability in the following product:
products: CrushFTP   versions 11.0.0 to 11.3.0 and versions 10.0.0 to 10.8.3
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
